wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Kane McClintock-Bunbury, 2nd Baron Rathdonnell (29 November 1848 – 22 May 1929), was an Anglo-Irish peer, British Army officer and politician.

response: |Thomas McClintock-Bunbury, 2nd Baron Rathdonnell||8 April 1889||Edward Plunkett, 16th Baron Dunsany||22 May 1929

He married Mary Margaret Conolly, daughter of Edward Michael Conolly on 6 June 1854; they had 11 children. The estates were inherited by his eldest son, Henry (1856–1927), a lieutenant in the Royal Artillery. In 1874 one of his daughters, Katharine Anne Bruen, married Thomas McClintock-Bunbury, 2nd Baron Rathdonnell.
* Thomas McClintock-Bunbury, 2nd Baron Rathdonnell (1848–1929), Anglo-Irish peer, politician and army officer
